birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国四川省广安县
birth_place.en: Guang'an County, Sichuan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾竹联帮首任总堂主及精神领袖。因策划并执行引发国际政治风波的“江南案”而闻名，后长期流亡柬埔寨，最终病逝于香港。
description.en: The first hall master and spiritual leader of the Bamboo Union gang in Taiwan. He is famous for planning and executing the "Henry Liu case," which caused an international political incident. He later lived in exile in Cambodia for a long time and eventually died of illness in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾著名的国际性黑社会组织，由校园帮派发展而来，在陈启礼领导下扩张壮大。
description.en: A famous international organized crime group in Taiwan, which originated from a school gang and expanded under the leadership of Chen Chi-li.

location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州戴利城

description.zh-cn: 由台湾国防部情报局策划，并由竹联帮帮主陈启礼率员赴美，刺杀美籍华裔作家刘宜良（笔名“江南”）的事件。此案引发了台湾与美国之间的严重外交危机。
description.en: An incident planned by Taiwan's Military Intelligence Bureau, where Bamboo Union leader Chen Chi-li led members to the United States to assassinate Chinese-American writer Henry Liu (pen name "Jiangnan"). This case triggered a severe diplomatic crisis between Taiwan and the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部下属的主要情报机构，是江南案的幕后策划者。
description.en: The main intelligence agency under the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China, and the mastermind behind the Henry Liu case.

death_place.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州戴利城

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔作家，笔名“江南”。因撰写《蒋经国传》等作品，被台湾情报机构视为“叛徒”，最终在江南案中被竹联帮成员杀害。
description.en: A Chinese-American writer with the pen name "Jiangnan." He was considered a "traitor" by Taiwanese intelligence agencies for writing works such as "The Biography of Chiang Ching-kuo" and was ultimately assassinated by members of the Bamboo Union in the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部情报局前局长，因主导江南案而被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Former director of the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China, sentenced to life imprisonment for his leading role in the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部情报局前处长，是江南案中向陈启礼下达指令的关键人物。
description.en: Former division chief of the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China, a key figure who delivered the orders to Chen Chi-li in the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮总护法，与陈启礼一同赴美执行江南案，并因此案被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: The Grand Protector of the Bamboo Union, who went to the United States with Chen Chi-li to carry out the Henry Liu case and was sentenced to life imprisonment for it.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮忠堂堂主，是江南案的三名主要执行者之一，案发后潜逃海外，最终死于美国监狱的械斗中。
description.en: Hall master of the Bamboo Union's Zhong Hall, one of the three main perpetrators of the Henry Liu case. He fled abroad after the incident and eventually died in a prison fight in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政府于1996年展开的大规模扫黑行动，陈启礼因被列为目标而遭到通缉，并因此流亡海外。
description.en: A large-scale anti-gang operation launched by the Taiwanese government in 1996. Chen Chi-li was listed as a target, leading to a warrant for his arrest and his subsequent exile.

description.zh-cn: 江南案后，台湾政府于1984年展开的首次全国性扫黑行动，陈启礼回台后在此专案中被捕。
description.en: Following the Henry Liu case, this was the first nationwide anti-gang operation launched by the Taiwanese government in 1984. Chen Chi-li was arrested under this operation upon his return to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1970年，竹联帮成员陈仁因盗领公款并转当警方污点证人，而遭到帮会成员刺杀的事件。此案导致陈启礼被视为幕后主使者并入狱服刑。
description.en: In 1970, Bamboo Union member Chen Ren was assassinated by fellow gang members after embezzling funds and becoming a police informant. This incident led to Chen Chi-li being considered the mastermind and subsequently imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统。江南案的爆发使其政府面临巨大的内外压力，他下令彻查并逮捕了涉案的情报局高级官员。
description.en: Then President of the Republic of China. The outbreak of the Henry Liu case put his government under immense internal and external pressure, leading him to order a full investigation and the arrest of high-ranking intelligence officials involved.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，陈启礼在1996年“治平专案”后长期流亡于此。
description.en: A country in Southeast Asia where Chen Chi-li lived in exile for a long time after the "Operation Clean Sweep" in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Chen Chi-li.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮创帮元老之一，也是陈启礼初入帮派时的老大。
description.en: One of the founding members of the Bamboo Union and Chen Chi-li's initial leader when he first joined the gang.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮元老，自任“总护法”。他在1968年主持会议推举陈启礼为总堂主，并在江南案发生后于美国向媒体揭露内幕，证实台湾政府涉案。
description.en: A veteran of the Bamboo Union who appointed himself "Grand Protector." He chaired the meeting in 1968 that elected Chen Chi-li as Hall Master and later exposed the inside story to the media in the U.S. after the Henry Liu case, confirming the Taiwanese government's involvement.

description.zh-cn: 在1995年由陈启礼亲自公开指定为竹联帮第二任帮主。
description.en: Publicly designated by Chen Chi-li as the second leader of the Bamboo Union in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼与第二任妻子齐维莉所生的长子，为台湾知名演员。
description.en: The eldest son of Chen Chi-li and his second wife, Qi Weili. He is a well-known Taiwanese actor.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼的第二任妻子，陈楚河的母亲。
description.en: Chen Chi-li's second wife and the mother of Chen Chu-he.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼的第三任妻子。
description.en: Chen Chi-li's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要黑社会组织之一，早期曾与竹联帮发生多次严重冲突。
description.en: One of Taiwan's major organized crime groups, which had several serious conflicts with the Bamboo Union in its early days.

description.zh-cn: 台北市中山区的在地帮派，曾因地盘问题与竹联帮爆发“香港西餐厅事件”。
description.en: A local gang in the Zhongshan District of Taipei, which clashed with the Bamboo Union in the "Hong Kong Western Restaurant Incident" over territory disputes.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮为进入台北市中山区，与在地帮派牛埔帮发生的重大械斗事件。此事件使竹联帮声名大噪，并从街头帮派转变为社会型帮派。
description.en: A major armed conflict between the Bamboo Union and the local Niupu Gang as the former tried to enter Taipei's Zhongshan District. The incident greatly enhanced the Bamboo Union's reputation and marked its transition from a street gang to a more organized social-type gang.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市淡水区的私立大学，陈启礼曾在此就读并获得工程学士学位。
description.en: A private university located in Tamsui District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, where Chen Chi-li studied and obtained a Bachelor of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼于1958年加入竹联帮，并在1968年被推举为总堂主，成为该帮派的领导核心和精神象征。
description.en: Chen Chi-li joined the Bamboo Union in 1958 and was elected Hall Master in 1968, becoming the gang's core leader and spiritual symbol.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼于1941年4月27日出生于四川省广安县。
description.en: Chen Chi-li was born on April 27, 1941, in Guang'an County, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼毕业于淡江大学，获得工程学士学位。
description.en: Chen Chi-li graduated from Tamkang University with a Bachelor of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 齐维莉是陈启礼的第二任妻子，后离婚。
description.en: Qi Weili was Chen Chi-li's second wife; they later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 陈怡帆是陈启礼的第三任妻子。
description.en: Chen Yifan was Chen Chi-li's third wife.

description.zh-cn: 陈楚河是陈启礼的长子。
description.en: Chen Chu-he is the eldest son of Chen Chi-li.

description.zh-cn: 陈楚河是齐维莉的儿子。
description.en: Chen Chu-he is the son of Qi Weili.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼因被视为陈仁案的幕后主使而被警方逮捕，并被判入狱五年半。
description.en: Chen Chi-li was arrested by the police as the suspected mastermind of the Chen Ren incident and was sentenced to five and a half years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 江南案后，陈启礼返台即被“一清专案”逮捕，并因江南案被判刑。
description.en: After the Henry Liu case, Chen Chi-li was arrested under "Operation Clean House" upon his return to Taiwan and was sentenced for his role in the assassination.

description.zh-cn: 因在“治平专案”中被列为通缉对象，陈启礼被迫逃亡至柬埔寨。
description.en: As a wanted target in "Operation Clean Sweep," Chen Chi-li was forced to flee to Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼被国防部情报局吸收，并接受训练，以执行刺杀刘宜良的任务。
description.en: Chen Chi-li was recruited by the Military Intelligence Bureau and received training to carry out the mission to assassinate Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 国防部情报局策划了江南案，并下达指令由竹联帮执行。
description.en: The Military Intelligence Bureau planned the Henry Liu case and issued orders for it to be carried out by the Bamboo Union.

description.zh-cn: 时任情报局局长汪希苓下达“制裁令”，派遣陈启礼等人赴美执行江南案。
description.en: Then Director of the Intelligence Bureau, Wang Hsi-ling, issued a "sanction order," dispatching Chen Chi-li and others to the U.S. to carry out the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼与吴敦、董桂森在美国加州将作家刘宜良（江南）枪杀。
description.en: Chen Chi-li, along with Wu Tun and Tung Kuei-sen, shot and killed writer Henry Liu (Jiangnan) in California, USA.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦是江南案的共同执行者之一，参与了对刘宜良的刺杀行动。
description.en: Wu Tun was one of the co-executors of the Henry Liu case, participating in the assassination of Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 董桂森是江南案的共同执行者之一，参与了对刘宜良的刺杀行动。
description.en: Tung Kuei-sen was one of the co-executors of the Henry Liu case, participating in the assassination of Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 江南案曝光后，总统蒋经国下令逮捕情报局长汪希苓等涉案官员。
description.en: After the Henry Liu case was exposed, President Chiang Ching-kuo ordered the arrest of involved officials, including Intelligence Bureau Director Wang Hsi-ling.

description.zh-cn: 竹联帮在发展扩张时期，与四海帮为主要竞争对手，双方多次爆发严重冲突。
description.en: During its expansion period, the Bamboo Union and the Four Seas Gang were major rivals, leading to several serious conflicts between the two.

description.zh-cn: 1968年，竹联帮因地盘问题与台北中山区的牛埔帮爆发“香港西餐厅事件”械斗。
description.en: In 1968, the Bamboo Union clashed with the Niupu Gang of Taipei's Zhongshan District in the "Hong Kong Western Restaurant Incident" over territorial disputes.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼在此事件中率领竹联帮以寡击众，使其声名大噪，奠定了他在帮中的领导地位。
description.en: In this incident, Chen Chi-li led the Bamboo Union to fight against overwhelming odds, which greatly enhanced his fame and solidified his leadership position within the gang.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，陈启礼亲自公开指定黄少岑担任竹联帮第二任帮主，完成权力交接。
description.en: In 1995, Chen Chi-li personally and publicly appointed Huang Shao-tsen as the second leader of the Bamboo Union, completing the transfer of power.

description.zh-cn: 1968年4月，张安乐主持阳明山会议，推举陈启礼为竹联帮“总堂主”，确立了其帮主地位。
description.en: In April 1968, Chang An-lo presided over the Yangmingshan meeting, which elected Chen Chi-li as the "Hall Master" of the Bamboo Union, establishing his position as the gang's leader.

description.zh-cn: 陈启礼于1958年由刘永吉引荐追随周榕加入竹联帮，周榕是其早期的老大。
description.en: In 1958, Chen Chi-li was introduced by Liu Yongji to follow Chou Jung and join the Bamboo Union, making Chou Jung his early leader.
